name: market for stone meal | stone meal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3996/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'stone meal', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.;stone meal' is an inorganic substance which is a by-product (filter residue) of stone mining. It is solid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure. It is modelled as a pure substance.  On a consumer level, is used in the following products: fertiliser.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'stone meal',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  stone meal', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/089:Mining and quarrying n.e.c./0891:Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals
tags: Sector: Resource Extraction; Minerals; Agriculture & Animal Husbandry
